SA14kamvchtu:522: ātmāpi tathārthakriyādibhirna kathañcanāpi sambadha iti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:524: tathā hi- sukhādinā hi sambandhe sati ādhārādheyalakṣaṇo vā saṃyogalakṣaṇo vā kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇo veti pakṣatrayam /
SA14kamvchtu:527: tathā hi- adhaḥprasarpaṇadharmiṇāṃ jalādīnāmadhogamanapratibandhakatvena vyavasthāpyate tāvadādhāraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:534: sthiteḥ pṛthakatve sati sā naiva tāvatsthāturupakārikā arthāntarabhūtatvāttasyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:539: anyathā tena bhaṅga eva tasya syānna tāvadavasthānam /
SA14kamvchtu:546: evaṃ ca naivopapadyate tāvad bhinnārthena bhinnārthasya saṃyogaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:548: api ca, saṃyogabalena yadi ātmā sukhī vā duḥkhī vā bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:551: tata evātmanā sahaikatve sukhādinā naiva syāt kaścit sukhī vā duḥkhī vā /
SA14kamvchtu:552: adarśane 'pi balenābhyupagate niścaye tenaiva niścitaḥ syāttadā kiṃ tāvat saṃyogaparikalpanayā,
SA14kamvchtu:554_0: sambandhibhedena bhinnāyāmapi prajñaptau paramārthataḥ bhāvānāmabhinnasvabhāve sati
SA14kamvchtu:554_1: kathaṃ svabhāvabhedāśritaḥ pṛthagarthakriyābhedaḥ syāditi kumatiparikalpita evāyaṃ khalu sambandhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:557: avikale hetau sati na yujyate tāvat kādācitkakāryasambhavaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:561: duḥkhotpādahetutvād yadi baddhastadā sarvathā baddhatvānnaiva muktaḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:564: aduḥkhāvasthotpādahetutvād yadi muktastadā vimukta eva bhavenna kadācidapi baddhaḥ syāttadā kathaṃ tāvat kalpyeta ādheyanibandhanaṃ bandhamokṣatvamiti /
SA14kamvchtu:565: yadi caitanyādilakṣaṇatvenotpādasāmarthyena vā kartā syāttadā kartā eva sadā bhavet katha tāvad bhoktā?
SA14kamvchtu:566: atha sukhādyutpādahetutvena yadi bhoktā syāttadā bhoktaiva bhavet kathaṃ tāvat kartā?
SA14kamvchtu:572: na khalu hetumātratayā kartā vā bhoktā vā,
SA14kamvchtu:587: ata eva yāvantaḥ paraparikalpitā ākāśādayo 'kṣaṇikābhāvāste sarve arthakriyāsāmarthyahitatvād abhāvavyavahāraviṣayā ucyante paramavicakṣaṇairbauddhairiti /
SA14kamvchtu:592: iti nāma vyavahāre sati nāsti nāmni vivādaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:594: tathāvidhānupalambhasvabhāve vandhyāputrādyaviśeṣe ca bhāvavyavahāro na yujyata ityāhuḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:600: vinaśvaratve sati skandhāntargatā eva pudgalāḥ prasajyeran,
SA14kamvchtu:602: athāvinaśvaratve tāvat skandhāntargatadharmavisadṛśatvādarthāntarā eva te bhaveyuriti doṣo 'yamuktapūrva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:609: pāramitāyogamadhikṛtyāha- api tu khalu punaḥ ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:612: dānam ityanena trividhadānamadhikṛtya ṣaṭ pāramitā darśitāḥ na tu dānamātram /
SA14kamvchtu:618: prajñāyāścābhāve sa tad viparītatayā dharmaṃ deśayet /
SA14kamvchtu:621: dānaṃ dātavyam ityanena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ kathaṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:624: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena dānaṃ dātavyam ityādinā vikṣepaṃ nigṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:625: tatra na vastupratiṣṭhiteneti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogasya yāthāvattvaṃ tāvannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:631: tathā hi- paraiḥ paramārthataḥ iṣṭā vijñānavyatiriktā arthāstāvānna pratyakṣasiddhāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:633: arthe sati sākāreṇa nirākāreṇa anyākāreṇa vā jñānena grahaṇamiti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:634: tatra tāvanna sākāreṇa citravarṇādidarśanakāle ekajñānābhinnatvādākāraṇāmapyekatvaṃ prasajyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:640: citrākāravyavasthāpanāyai anekajñānotpādaparikalpanayāpi jñānasya viṣayaṃ vyāpya sthitatvād grāhakajñānānāmutpādo 'pi na sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:642: anyacca, sārūpyaṃ tāvadekadeśena bhavet sarvātmanā vā /
SA14kamvchtu:643: tatra na tāvat sarvātmanā- arthajjñānasyāpi jaḍasvabhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA14kamvchtu:647: atha tadutpannaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ cetyetaddvayena vedayatīti arthasārupyasya samanastarapratyayasyāpi grāhakatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:648: satyapi sārūpye paramārthataḥ bāhyārtho na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:664: anekatve saṃghātasya paramāṇureva sa syānna tvarthāntaraḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:671: viśeṣasya kasyacidabhyupagame sa eva tāvat sākāratvābhyupagamaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:672: pratītisvabhāvamātre tāvad viśeṣābhāvājjñānātmani nākārātiriktaṃ bhedakamanyat syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:675: evaṃ hi sati rūpaviṣayakamākāravijñānaṃ tāvat parīkṣāmarhati,
SA14kamvchtu:676: tathā hi- na tāvat pratyakṣato 'rthaḥ sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:678: apratyakṣasyārthasya jñānasya ca kenāpi hetunā sambandhāsiddheḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:683: na tāvat paramārthataḥ jñānasvabhāvatā pratyakṣeṇa sidhyati,
SA14kamvchtu:688: na, tvanmate tābhyāṃ saha tasya kasyacidapi sambandhasyāsiddhatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:693: parokṣeṇa saha sambandhastu na kenāpyarvāgdarśinā grahītuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:701: ata eva paramārthataḥ bhāvasvabhāvasādhakaṃ kiñcidapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
SA14kamvchtu:703: ityevaṃ tāvat- yadekānekasvabhāvavigataṃ tat paramārthato niḥsvabhāvam,
SA14kamvchtu:714: tathā hi- anekasmin vibhajyamāne sati vibhaktāḥ paramāṇava eva syuḥ tataśca paurvāparyāvasthānaṃ na syānniravayavatvāt paramāṇūnām,
SA14kamvchtu:716: tato diśaṃ vyāpya avasthitā na pratibhāseran /
SA14kamvchtu:724: yathāsaṃkhyam anekavijñānāni yugapat pravartanta ityapi vaktuṃ na yujyate niravayavānāmamūrtānāṃ khalu paurvāparyāvasthiterayuktatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:728: sati caivaṃ kathaṃ te tatra bhāseran mṛṣāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:730: tasya jñānagatadharmatve sati mithyākārāṇāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantābhyāvaḥ syāditi kathamavabhāseranniti /
SA14kamvchtu:731: tataḥ prakāśātmakākārebhyaḥ mṛṣātvenābhyupetebhyaḥ kastāvadanyaḥ jñānasvabhāvaḥ sadbhūtaste 'vaśiṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:734: nīlādīnāṃ svasvabhāvād bhinnaṃ yadanyat prakāśarūpamiti sadbhūtaṃ kimapi nāti,
SA14kamvchtu:740: tayostāvat tādātmyalakṣaṇo vā tadutpattilakṣaṇo vā sambandha eva nāsti /
SA14kamvchtu:747: ata eva yathā yathārthāścityante viśīryante tathā tathā /
SA14kamvchtu:754: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam /
SA14kamvchtu:758: yathaiva ārdraṃ kadalīyaskandhaṃ sārārthikaḥ puruṣu vipāṭayet /
SA14kamvchtu:759: bahirvā adhyātma na sāramasti tathopamān jānatha sarvadharmān //
SA14kamvchtu:762: evaṃ dānādiṣu yathā yogastathā ādarśitaḥ, nānyatra /
SA14kamvchtu:763: yadi paramārthata kasyacidapi vastuno bhāvābhāvād vastupratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ na dātavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:764: tadā avastvabhiniveśena tu dānasya kathaiva kā,
SA14kamvchtu:770: tato vastuno 'bhāve 'pi tāvadabhiniveśo na yujyata evetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:771: na rūpapratiṣṭhitena ityādinā bodhisattvena na kvacitpratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamityeva vistareṇābhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:775: anutpādādayo vikalpā api na karaṇīyā iti nidarśanārtha subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:780: ata eva na kvacit pratiṣṭhitena iti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:789: prathamapakṣe kenāpi kasyacidapi deyasyābhāvāt puṇyābhāvaḥ prasajyate,
SA14kamvchtu:791: bodhisattvaiḥ yo hi sattvārthaṃ śrama āsthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:797: anyathā kathaṃ bhagavatārthijanebhyaḥ putrādayaḥ pradattā iti sarvāṇyetāni codyāni manasi nidhāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:800: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- samyagdṛṭivihitāni dānādīni suviśuddhatayā viśiṣṭeṣṭaphalāni abhinirvartayanti,
SA14kamvchtu:810: ata eva anupalambhapratiṣṭhitāni dānādīni samyagdṛṣṭisambhūtānīti vipaścitsu prasādātiśayaṃ janayanti, nānyeṣu /
SA14kamvchtu:811: tataśca dānādiṣvapravṛttatayā puṇyābhāvo deyādīnāṃ caikāntābhāvo neṣyate,
SA14kamvchtu:827_0: tadabhāvānna rūpapratiṣṭhitena dānaṃ dātavyamiti bodhisattvaḥ tathāgatarūpakāyāptikāmanayā
SA14kamvchtu:827_1: dānādiṣu kathaṃ pravarteteti cediti codyamāśaṅkaya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādinā
SA14kamvchtu:829: lakṣaṇasampadā iti nimittamātrābhidhānena tathāgatasya nikhilo rūpakāyaḥ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanairalaṅkṛtaḥ paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:830: tatra lakṣaṇāni tāvat cakrāṅkahastapādatādīni dvātriṃśat padabāhulyabhiyā nollikhyante,
SA14kamvchtu:836: ata eva tathāvidhe rūpakāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdeśaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:837: athemāni lakṣaṇāni paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvāni vā tadārabdhāvayavirūpāṇi vā bhaveyuriti?
SA14kamvchtu:844: etad vicintya subhūtirāha no hīdam iti vyaktīkṛtam /
SA14kamvchtu:845: yadi lakṣaṇāni mṛṣā bhaveyustarhi kathaṃ bhagavatā tattatsūtreṣu lakṣaṇāni samupadiṣṭānīti cintayan tatkasya hetoḥ iti pṛṣṭvaivaṃ saivālakṣaṇasampad ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:870: tatrānāgate puruṣeṣu pañcakaṣāyāṇāmādhikyādevaṃvidhadharmaratnasya atyantagambhīrodāraphalatvāt pravacanadharmakāye 'nāptatvāśaṅkayā asti iti pṛṣṭavān /
SA14kamvchtu:871: asti iti padaṃ tu kecit sattvāḥ ye imeṣvevaṃrūpeṣu sūtrāntapadeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu bhūtasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti ityarthapadena yojyam /
SA14kamvchtu:872: paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyām ityatra śatānāṃ pañcakaṃ pañcaśatī,
SA14kamvchtu:887: arthato 'viparyayastasaṃjñaivātra bhūtasaṃjñetyabhidhīyate na tu śabdābhiniveśamātram 'ayaṃ bhūtaḥ'; iti saṃjñā /
SA14kamvchtu:890: pratyakṣavad dṛṣṭavā bhagavān sūbhūtisaśayaṃ parihartuṃ bhaviṣyanti ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:895: yathā vā bhūtasaṃjñayā saṃjñitāstān bhagavān paridīpitaṃvān /
SA14kamvchtu:896: śīlavantaḥ guṇavantaḥ prajñāvantaśca ityanena tu kramaśo 'dhiśīlādhicittādhiprajñāśceti śikṣātrayapratiprattisamanvitāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:899: kleśavati paścimakāle tu kathaṃ tathāvidhaśīlādiguṇavanto bhaviṣyantīti cintayitvā sūbhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:902: avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ tāvadavavādamanuśāsanīṃ ca śirasādāya śīlādiguṇasampadbhyaḥ prayatnavanto draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:903: teṣāṃ tato 'pi bahutaraṃ puṇyamabhidhātuṃ anekabuddhaśatasahasraḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:910: anyathā sarveṣāṃ jñānāt jñānāt sarvajño bhagavāniti deśanayā ko viśeṣo darśito bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:911: athavā tatteṣāṃ bhavyatvaṃ yat tatpramukhaṃ kṛtvā deśanā pravartitetyavagantavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:913: atasteṣāmaśeṣaṃ puṇyaskandhasaṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ sarve te sattvāḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:916: ebhiḥ sarvairabhūtasaṃjñāṃ nirākṛtya bhūtasaṃgyotpādane chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitaṃ tathā sthānasyāsyaudāryamapi paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:918: te anekabuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāḥ kathaṃ jñāsyanta iti jñāpakahetau paripṛṣṭe 'tra teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:919: anena tavat yogasamāpattau kathaṃ pratittavyamityetat prakāśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:925: yadi nāsti ātmādisaṃjñā tarhi kiṃ śrāvakādivad asti rūpādidharmasaṃjñā?
SA14kamvchtu:930: iti cintāyāṃ evaṃ nādharmasaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:931: saṃvṛtau avicāraramaṇīyatayā dharmāṇāṃ sadbhāvāt saṃvṛtipathasthitebhyastāvad adharmasaṃjñā naiva yuktimatī,
SA14kamvchtu:933: tanniṣedhānna kaścid dharma upalabhyate yatrādharmasaṃjñā pravarteta,
SA14kamvchtu:936: tadyathā satye 'pi vijñaptimātre vijñaptimātrateyamiti vikalpayan na vijñaptimātratāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:938: yadyātmādīnāmasattvaṃ tadā tatra tatsaṃjñāyā apravṛtau satyāṃ 'ātmaiva rūpamidam';
SA14kamvchtu:939: ityādikaṃ nāmamātramiti nāmābhiniveśasaṃjñā teṣāṃ bhavediti matvā saṃjñāpi ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:943: yadyevaṃ tarhi tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sarvasaṃjñāvigamād mṛta-nirodhasamāpannapudgalavad yogino 'bhāva eva syāditi nāpi..... nāaṃjñā pravartate ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:948: yad yogijñānaṃ saṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tat kenāvagamyata iti cet?
SA14kamvchtu:957: niḥsvabhāvatāvicāreṇa tadgocarībhūtānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyena nairātmasaṅgrahāt yā khalu vyavasthā saiva yugapadulambhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:962: tasmāt sati nairātmyadvayāvabodhe teṣāmanekaśatasahasrabuddhānāṃ paryupāsanaṃ pratīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:964: sa tu saṃsāre na ucito bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:965: anayā yogasamāpattyā kathaṃ pratipattavyaṃ kīdṛśyā ca bhūtasaṃjñayā tat saṃjñātavyamiti saṃdarśitaṃ tadgāmbhīryamityapi ca paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:966: ātmādīnāmasattve teṣāmātmādisaṃjñāyā abhāvāt padasamudāyādibhiḥ ātmatva sūktaṃ duraktaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ dharmādharmasaṃjñaṃ kiṃ teṣu niyamena na pravartate?
SA14kamvchtu:967: naivam, yadi bodhisattvānā na bhavet tatra saṃjñā, (tarhi)
SA14kamvchtu:968: ayuktayupapannatīrthakaradharmān parityajya bhagavaddeśiteṣu dharmeṣu tadadhigamāya kathaṃ chanda utpādanīya ityāśaṅkāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:970: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- ekānekasvabhāvavicāreṇa yathā rūpādilakṣaṇadharmā na saṃvidyante,
SA14kamvchtu:972: yatra dharmasaṃjñā tatrātmādisaṃjñā api niścayena naiva prahīṇā,
SA14kamvchtu:975: tasyā eva manasikārarūpatvāt maitrīprabhṛtiṣu tattvamanasikārāsadbhāve nātmadṛṣṭiḥ parihīyate /
SA14kamvchtu:978: api ca, bodhisattvānāṃ sā dharmasaṃjñā yadyavaśyamanutpannadarśanamārgaḥ syāt tathā sati tena kathamātmādisaṃjñā prahīṇā syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:980: ataḥ sarvametat parīkṣya sa eva teṣāmātmagrāho bhavet ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:982: anyathā tayorbhinnākāratvāt kathaṃ dharmasaṃjñaiva ātmagrāhaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:984: evaṃ sati tattatsūtreṣu kathaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvebhyaḥ saddharmaḥ parigrāhayiṣyate?
SA14kamvchtu:990: abhipretasiddhyarthaṃ kolopamadeśitasya lakṣaṇasya na grahaṇaniṣedha ityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:991: tasmāt ityādinā sa evārthaḥ padāntarai prayuktaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:992: yato hi sarvo dharmo 'dharmaśca satya ityabhiniveśasya viparītābhiniveśatvād,
SA14kamvchtu:993: yuktyopapanno ya āgamasamūhaḥ saṃsārārṇavottaraṇāya proktaḥ kolopamaḥ sa (yadā)
SA14kamvchtu:994: pāraṃ gatvā niṣprayojanatvāt parityājyo bhavati, kimu (tadā)
SA14kamvchtu:997: anyathā dharmādharmādikaṃ yadi satyasvabhāvaṃ syāt tadā paramārthaviṣayatvāt tadabhiniveśasya saṃsārapāragateṣvapi yuktisahaṃ (Vajraṭ_137)
SA14kamvchtu:1009: tena prasiddhaviruddhāḥ adharmalakṣaṇāḥ paraparikalpitā ātmādayaśca upadiṣṭāste 'pi saṃgṛhyante /
SA14kamvchtu:1011: anena tāvad vikṣepaṃ nīgṛhya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyamityetad darśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1015: tadā abhisambuddho bhūtvā 'bhagavatā sarve dharmā deśitāḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:1017: ata eva bodhisattvaiḥ tathāgatajñānahetumadhigamadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chando na janayitavyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1018: ityetad vicārya jñānahetudharmakāyāvāptaye chandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityaktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1019: anenārthataḥ paramārthastu anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti abhisambuddha ityetayoḥ (Vajraṭ_138)
SA14kamvchtu:1021: tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvaṃ tu tathāgatasya jñānahetuṃ jñānadharmakāyaṃ prāptuṃ chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca pradarśite /
SA14kamvchtu:1022: anuttarā samyaksambodhiḥ ityupalakṣaṇamātraparidīpanena śrāvaka-pratyekabuddhādīnāṃ pratipattibhedena bhinnaḥ jñānahetuko 'dhigamakāyastāvannirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1025: saṃvṛtisvabhāvastvevam- sambodhiḥ samboddhavyaṃ deśanā deśitavyamityādayaḥ sarve paryāyāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1027: taduktābhiprāyaṃ saṃgṛhya āryasubhūtisthaviraḥ yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi ityetadavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1030: dharmadeśanā ca na sta iti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1031: agrāhyaḥ iti paramārthastāvannirvikalpajñānagocaro 'pi na bhavatīti uktapūrvam /
SA14kamvchtu:1037: nanu syuḥ sarve bhāvā agrāhyāḥ anabhilāpyāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1038: tathāpi svalakṣaṇadhāraṇāt paramārthataḥ dharmasvabhāvatāsthitā evetyāśaṅkāyāṃ na sa dharmaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1039: sarvabhāvānāṃ paramārthataḥ svabhāvena parinirvṛttatvānna sambhavati svalakṣaṇadhārakatvam /
SA14kamvchtu:1040: yadyevaṃ tarhi bhagavatā abhāvo 'bhisambuddho draṣṭavya iti vicārya nādharmaḥ ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1041: sa tu prasajyapratiṣedhasvabhāvaḥ anena tāvat yogasamāpattiṃ nirdiśya adhyāropo 'pavādāntaśca nirastau /
SA14kamvchtu:1054: abhisandhāya tathāgatena asaṃskṛtaprabhāvitā āryaśrāvakā iti deśitam,
SA14kamvchtu:1068: bhāvagrahaṇābhāvena tadabhāvarūpatve sati bhāvagrāha eva tāvat prasajyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1069: ata eva āryasandhinirmocanasūtre uktam- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1076: ataḥ abhāvarūpatvena dharmeṣu sattvādatattvameva svabhāvena tat /
SA14kamvchtu:1080: ata eva teṣu āryasandhinirmocanādiṣu- 'na tattvasya bhāvāditaro 'rthaḥ'; ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1081: ata eva na dharmo nādharmaḥ ityuvāca /
SA14kamvchtu:1086: yadi bhagavato 'bhisambodhirvā dharmadeśanā vā nāsti kaściod dharmaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1087_0: kathaṃ tarhi bodhisattvena puṇyahetudharmakāyaṃ prāptukāmena saddharmaparigrahe 'nupravartitavyamiti
SA14kamvchtu:1087_1: vicintya puṇyahetudharmakayakāmatācchandotpādanāya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1093: tato nidānam iti ratnadānānāṃ nidānāt tataḥ puṇyodbhavaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1107: prajñaptisattvāt skandhānāṃ na puṇyaskandho bhāvarūpeṇa sambhavati /
SA14kamvchtu:1109: bhāvānāṃ sthiratvena abhisaṃskāreṇa apravṛttatvāt cittamapi prajñaptisanmātrameva /
SA14kamvchtu:1110: ekānekasvabhāvena pratisvaṃ parīkṣāyāṃ mithyaiva tāvat svabhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1111: ata eva na puṇyaskandhaḥ paramārthato vidyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1124: tena ca bahutaraṃ puṇyamiti āvedituṃ bhagavatā yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1126: puṇyahetukādhigamakāyasya pravacanakāyato nirjātatvāt tataścatuṣpādikāyāmapi gāthāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ (yadā)
SA14kamvchtu:1128: tathāgatānāṃ puṇyahetukadharmakāyasya tu kathaiva keti nirdiśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1131: etena paramārthataḥ dharmadeśanāyāḥ abhisambuddhasya cāpyasattve saṃvṛtau tāvat puṇyakāyadeśanāyāḥ sattvāt bodhisattvaiḥ puṇyamadhigāntuṃ pravartayitavyamevetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1134: ṣaṭpādikāyā gāthāyāḥ sattve 'pi catuṣpādikā iti viśeṣīkṛtā /
SA14kamvchtu:1144: kimiti śraddheyamātramuta yuktito 'vagamyamiti manasi kṛtvā tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1145: iti pṛcchāyām ato nirjātā hi subhūte,
SA14kamvchtu:1147: evaṃ (Vajraṭ_143) bahutaraṃ puṇyam iti tacca bṛhatphalatvāttat bahutaraṃ puṇyam,
SA14kamvchtu:1149: ratnanirjātaṃ tatpuṇyaṃ tu mahāparibhogādi gauṇasāaṃsārikaṃ phalaṃ prāpayati /
SA14kamvchtu:1152: dharmadānena tāvadakṣayāpratimatathāgatapadaprāpteḥ tanmahattvaṃ kimiti na prasaktam?
SA14kamvchtu:1153: yathā dharmeṇānugraho na tathā ratnaiḥ pareṣāmanugrahaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1154: tathā hi parebhyaḥ samprakāśitena kramaśo 'nena dharmeṇa kṣiprameva buddhatvapadaṃ labhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1156: ata eva parebhyaḥ parānugrāhakatvād ratnadānād dharmadānaṃ viśiṣṭamityābhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1159: tāni tāvad daśa caritāni- lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ dānaṃ vācanaṃ śravaṇam udgrahaṇam samprakāśanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ cintanaṃ bhāvanā ceti /
SA14kamvchtu:1160: ato nirjātāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ iti saṃvṛtau etānyāśritya buddhāḥ prajñaptā iti (Vajraṭ_144)
SA14kamvchtu:1161: vākyaśeṣaḥ paramārthatastu bodhiḥ buddhaśca bhinnau na staḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1162: anena tāvat puṇyasya paramavaiśiṣṭayaparidīpanena tadutpādayituṃ chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:1163: yadi paramārthataḥ sarvadharmānutpāda eva tadā sarve buddhadharmā apyanutpannā eva bhaveyuḥ tatkatham ato nirjātā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti?
SA14kamvchtu:1164: na buddhānāṃ bodherbhinnatvamiti vicārya tatkasya heto?
SA14kamvchtu:1167: buddhaprajñaptihetukā anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhilakṣaṇā dharmā eva hi buddhadharmāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1169: apitu prajñaptihetutvād ato nirjātā buddhaḥ ityuktamityabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1171: saṃvṛtimāśritya tathāgatānāmanusamyaksaṃbodhistu ato nirjātā ityādinā tathāgatena bhāṣitā,
SA14kamvchtu:1173: ata eva tattaditarapakṣebhyaḥ buddhadharmā iti paramārthato naiva vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1176: atra kecidāhuḥ kathaṃ tridhā bhinno 'yaṃ dharmakāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1178: prajñaptyā ca pravacanasvabhāvo dharmakāya iti ced?
SA14kamvchtu:1179: tathā sati rūpakāyo 'pi tatprāpteranurūpahetutvāt tatprāpakahetutvācca dharmakāyaḥ syāditi /
SA14kamvchtu:1181: bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ dharmakāyastu pariśuddhajñānasvabhāvastathā yā ca tasya sāmānyadharmatā,
SA14kamvchtu:1184: na cātra pravacanapuṇyayorupacāreṇa dharmaḥ iti deśanāpi /
SA14kamvchtu:1188: svasāmānyalakṣaṇadhāraṇād dharmā iti yat vyākhyātaṃ tat sarvadharmasādhāraṇamiti na rūpakāyastathāgatatvena nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1190: prajñaptita ityucyamāne 'pi na rūpakāyo dharmakāyatvena prasakto bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:1193: buddhānāṃ rūpikāyo hi puṇyaṃ sambhṛtya jāyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1198: sambhāralakṣaṇapuṇyanicayasyāpi tatprāptihetutvāt prajñaptyā dharmakāya ityucyamāno 'pi yujyata eveti alamadhikena /
SA14kamvchtu:1199: anyat kucodyaṃ yuktamayuktaṃ veti vicakṣaṇairviveciyiṣyata iti matvā padabāhulyabhiyā na likhyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1201: itaḥ paraṃ dvādaśavipakṣāṇāṃ pratipakṣāṇi dvādaśasthānāni yathākramaṃ veditavyāni /
SA14kamvchtu:1217: tatra bhagavatā dharmapudgalayorvistareṇa nairātmye deśite 'pi anādikālīnadṛḍhātmābhiniveśasañcayabalena yadi kaścidevaṃ manyeta- yasya sattvādisaṃjñā pravartate,
SA14kamvchtu:1219: evaṃ tarhi yaduktaṃ bhagavatā 'tasmin kāle 'haṃ vīradatto nāma nṛpo 'bhavam,
SA14kamvchtu:1220: '; yuṣmabhyaṃ mayā dharmo deśayiṣyate ityādi kathaṃ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1221: (ataḥ) sattvasaṃjñādivirahasya naivamabhiprāya iti vighnabhūtābhimānavisaṃyogārthaṃ pañcamasthānamadhikṛtyāha- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādi /
SA14kamvchtu:1222: asyāyamatra sāmānyato 'rthaḥ- ye mama mṛduśrāvakāḥ srotaāpannatvādiṣu dharmanairātmyānadhigamād aprāptarasānubhavāḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1223: teṣāmapi ahantvena mamatvena cābhiniveśo na bhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:1225: tasmin kāle 'ham..... ityādi yattallokena saha vyavahāraprajñaptyarthaṃ parasantānavyavacchedamātrajñāpanārthaṃ vā,
SA14kamvchtu:1229: tattvajñānasthitaiḥ na śakyate tāvallokena saha vyavahartum /
SA14kamvchtu:1234: tasya ca kartari karmaṇi kriyāyāṃ cābhiniveśaprahāṇena idampratyayatādhigamānnairātmyādhigamo darśitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1238: ityanena tāvadarthataḥ mayā prāptamiti vipakṣatvena paridītyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1239: na srotaāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā prāptam ityanena apalakṣaṇamātrapradarśanena sarveṣāmabhimānānāṃ praheyatvaṃ pradarśaye /
SA14kamvchtu:1241: āryasubhūtirapi bhagavato 'bhiprāyaṃ nirdiśan paramārthasthāpannārthaṃ tatra yogasamāpattiṃ ca grahītuṃ na hi sa bhagavan kañcid (dharmaṃ)
SA14kamvchtu:1252: sthiterabhāvāt kenāpi kathamapi tanna prāptuṃ śakyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1253: yasmin santāne nairātmyamārgalakṣaṇahetusannihitatayā kleśamutpādātyantaviruddhāśrayalakṣaṇaṃ phalamutpadyata iti phalaṃ prāptyata ityevamucyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1255: api ca, prāpyaprāpakabhāvaḥ khalu bhinnakālikaḥ samakāliko vā syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1256: tatra na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ dvayorapi sthitatvāt,
SA14kamvchtu:1270: idaṃ prāpyamidañca prāpakamiti niścayo na bhavatī /
SA14kamvchtu:1272: teṣāṃ sarvātmanā saṃyoge sati ekatvaṃ prasajyate,
SA14kamvchtu:1275: nairantaryeṇāvasthāne 'pi na bhavituṃ śaknoti ubhayoḥ sādhāraṇatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:1282: śeṣeṇa rūpādinā ca dharmāyatanaikadeśena ca saṃskṛtā nirdiśyante /
SA14kamvchtu:1288: yadi mayā prāptamityabhiniveśastadā kathaṃ nocyeta srota āpanna iti vicintya saced bhagavan ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1292: sa pṛthagjana iti kathaṃ syāt srota-āpanna ityabhisandhiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1297: amumevārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntāntare prapañcya nirdeṣṭuṃ sakṛdāgāminaḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1306: na hi sa kaścid dharmo yo 'rhannāma prahīṇatathāvidhakleśāvaraṇajñānasantatau upacaritatvāt,
SA14kamvchtu:1307: santateśca prajñaptau sattvānna sa kaścana paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1310: padaprayojyamātmānamadhikṛtya viśiṣṭatvena araṇāvihārīti sādhāraṇaguṇatvena arhanniti ca 'ahamasmi';
SA14kamvchtu:1313: atra cobhatobhāgavimuktatvamarhattvamālambya taditareṣu raṇā notpādyanta iti vicintya yogaḥ samāpadyate /
SA14kamvchtu:1314: tato vyutthāya tamālambya taditareṣu nopajāyante raṇāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1318: na māṃ vyākariṣyat iti tadā aprahīṇatvādātmadṛṣṭermayā srota-āpattiphalamapi durlabham,
SA14kamvchtu:1320: kathamaraṇāyāṃ vihartavyamiti cintāyāṃ na kvacid viharati ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1321: prāptaṃ mayā kiñcat saṃkṛtamaṃskṛtaṃ vetyevamabhiniveśena yo 'sthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1324: adhunā ahamasmi bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena araṇāvihāriṇāmagryo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1325: ahamasmi bhagavan arhan vītarāgaḥ iti nātmābhiniveśena,
SA14kamvchtu:1330: nanvasati kasmiṃścidapi prāpye prāpake vā paramārthataḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1331: bodhisattvabhūtena bhagavatā kathaṃ tathāgatadīpaṅkarasyāntikād dharma udgṛhītaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1333_1: teṣāmalpaśrutatvapratibandhāpākaraṇārtha ṣaṣṭhaṃ sthānamadhikṛtyāha- asti sa kaścid
SA14kamvchtu:1333_2: dharmo yastathāgatena dīpaṅkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasyāntikādudgṛhītaḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1334: subhūtirapi prāgevābhiprāyaṃ viditvā no hīdam ityavocat /
SA14kamvchtu:1335: nāsti paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasya prāpyaprāpakatvena udgrahaṇaṃ nāma,
SA14kamvchtu:1338: tathāpi tathāgatānubhāvena nānāpadasamudāyādīnāṃ jñānāvabhāsotpādamatre udgṛhītaḥ ityupacaryate,
SA14kamvchtu:1340: anenārthataḥ 'bodhisattvena śrutaparyeṣaṇakāle buddhotpāda ārādhanīyastadanantaraṃ buddhadharmā udgṛhītavyāḥ';
SA14kamvchtu:1346: ityanena paramārthataḥ dharmāṇāmagrāhyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatra yogasamāpattiḥ vikṣepanigrahaśca nirdiṣṭau /
SA14kamvchtu:1349_0: yadi paramārthataḥ karmakartrādayo na syustadā kathaṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ
SA14kamvchtu:1352: bhagavān bodhisattvānāṃ tattatkṣetrapariśuddhisampadaṃ kathamuktavāniti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1355: avyūhāste iti paramāṇubhirābdho 'vayavibhūto vā nāsti kaścid vyūhaḥ paramārthata ityavyūhā eva te,
SA14kamvchtu:1356: tathāpi svapnopalabdhakṣetravyūhavad avicāraramaṇīyamātra saṃvṛtisattvamuktaṃ tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1360: evāṃ muṣitasmṛtikānāmupakārāya upasaṃhāropayena smārayituṃ tasmād ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1362: kasyacidapi vastunaḥ siddherabhāvāt tatra 'apratiṣṭhitaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam'; ityarthaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1364: tatra vitathaṃ vadet ityanenārthataḥ paramārthataḥ mayā kṣetravyūho niṣpādyata ityabhiniveśo vipakṣatvena paridīpitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1367: hīnālambanamanasikārabhāvanāṃ prati chandaḥ praṇidhānamapi [na karttavyamityapi] nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:1368: avyūhāste tathāgatena bhāṣitāḥ ityanena paramārthavyavasthāpanena yogasamāpattau pravṛttiḥ gambhīratā ca nirdiśyete /
SA14kamvchtu:1369: tenocyante kṣetravyūhāḥ ityanenāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1372: skandhebhyaḥ pṛthaktvenāsattve 'pi kiṃ nābhinnā eva sattvāḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1375: tasmāt sattvopekṣālakṣaṇavighnabhūtād visaṃyogārtham aṣṭamasthānamadhikṛtya tadyathāpi nāma ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:1379: kimarthaṃ deśitaṃ bhagavatetyabhiprāyaṃ vaktukāmanayā tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:1381: tameva abhiprāyaṃ vaktumāha- na bhāvaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1384: svapnadṛṣṭa iva sa ātmabhāvaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ proktastathāgatena,
SA14kamvchtu:1389: anyathā paramārthataḥ kasyacidapi dharmasyāsiddhatvāt tathā nocyetetyabhiprāyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1390: abhāvaṃ tāvad bhāvatvenābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāṃ jaiminyādīnāṃ pratiṣedhārtham na sa bhāvaḥ ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1391: abhāvasya tu bhāvavyatirekeṇa sthitalakṣaṇatvāt kathaṃ tadviparītasvabhāvo na syāt?
SA14kamvchtu:1394: tato 'yamabhāvatvena deśitaḥ sumerumātraparimāṇo 'pi ya ātmabhāvo yadā niḥsvabhāvatvāt paramārthato nāsti,
SA14kamvchtu:1395: tadā kathaṃ parātmabhāvaḥ sasvabhāvaḥ sātmako vā bhavet?
SA14kamvchtu:1396: atrārthataḥ sattvaparipākāyodyamaratānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvābhiniveśaḥ paramārthataḥ vipakṣatvena pradarśitaḥ tatprahāṇāya chandaḥ praṇidhānaṃ ca nirdiṣṭe /
SA14kamvchtu:1398: na bhāvaḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ ityanena tāvat paramārthaṃ vyasthāpya yogasamāpattisthānaṃ gambhīratvaṃ ca paridīpite /
SA14kamvchtu:1399: na sa bhāvaḥ ityanena tu vikṣepanigraho nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:1401: sampratyasya dharmaparyāyasya mahārthatvapratipādanena bāhyaśāstreṣvabhiniviṣṭānāṃ tatrānunayavikṣepaparihārārthaṃ navamasthānamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase sūbhūte ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:1402: (Vajraṭ_155) anena tāvat caturbhiḥ prakārairasya dharmaparyāyasya vaiśiṣṭyaṃ paridīpyatepuṇyaparigrahaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:1406: tatra puṇyaparigrahastu yadāha tato nidānaṃ bahupuṇyaskandhaṃ prasunuyāt iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1407: devādibhiḥ satkārastu yadāha sa pṛthivīpradeśaḥ caityabhūtyabhūto bhaved iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1408: duṣkarakṛtyavidhānaṃ tu yadāha parameṇa te āścaryeṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1409: tathāgatāditulyatākaraṇaṃ tu yadāha tasmiṃśca pṛthivīpradeśe śāstā viharatyanyatarānyataro vā vijñagurusthānīyaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:1410: tatra ratnadānasya puṇyābhidhānaṃ viśeṣadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ paridīpitam- vastuviśeṣaḥ kṣetraviśeṣaśca /

SA14kamvchtu:2281: paramārthavaśena saṃvṛtijñānaṃ pariśuddhadhyatītyataḥ pūrvaṃ paramārthasatyagrāhakaṃ paścācca saṃvṛtisatyagrāhakamabhihitamiti saṅgacchate kramanirdeśaḥ /

SA14kamvchtu:2324: yadi nāsti traikālikaṃ cittaṃ tadā puṇyaskandho 'pi na syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:2326: tataḥ tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ sampādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvo yatnaṃ kūryāditi vicintya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2327: anena kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yo 'ntaśo ratnādikaṃ bāhyavastu tyajati, so 'pi (yadi)
SA14kamvchtu:2329: kathaṃ na tathāgatasya asaṃkhyeyāprameyakalpeṣu duṣkarānekaśatānyabhyasyataḥ puṇyaskandhādhipatyaṃ syādityevaṃ deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2330: ata eva paramārthato 'satyapi puṇyaskandhe saṃvṛtau sattvād bodhisattvena tatra vaśībhāvaṃ niṣpādayituṃ chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamityādarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2332: kathaṃ na paramārthataḥ puṇyaskandhasattvaṃ vyavasthāpyata iti vicintya 'bodhisattvenātra kathaṃ pratipattavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:2339: anena tathāgatasya puṇyaskandhādhipatyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ prasthitena bodhisattvena paramārthatastadanupalambhena yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyam /
SA14kamvchtu:2345: yadi puṇyaskandho naiva syāt tadā tathāgatānāṃ dvividhā kāyalakṣaṇasampad-anuvyañjanakāyasampad,
SA14kamvchtu:2349_0: tasmāt tathāgatasya dvividhāṃ kāyasampadaṃ pariniṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ bodhisattvairyatno
SA14kamvchtu:2349_1: 'nuṣṭheya iti vicintayadbhyastathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadamadhikṛtya- tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:2353: ataḥ paramārthataḥ na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2357: tasmād bodhisattvena māyānirmitabuddhasya tathāvidharūpādhimuktayā tatpratipattaye chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2359: pūrvamadhimukticaryābhūmau rūpakāyāptikāmatākāle tathāgatapūjāsatkārakāle ca tathāvidho 'bhiniveśaḥ parivarjitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2361: pariniṣpādayituṃ samprasthitasya bodhisattvasya rūpe 'bhiniveśo bhavatīti yāsāṃ prasiddhistāsāṃ pariṣadāṃ durvikalpo nirākṛta ityuktatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2362: evaṃ tarhi tathāgatānāṃ rūpakāyaḥ kasmād deśita iti vicintya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2364: na rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā tathāgato draṣṭavyaḥ ityanena yojanīyam /
SA14kamvchtu:2372: anena cāpavādāntaṃ parihṛtya kathaṃ cittaṃ pragrahītavyam, (iti)
SA14kamvchtu:2375: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya rūpakāyasampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ bodhisattvaiḥ karaṇīyānāṃ yatnānāṃ nidarśanena ādāryamapi dīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2380: yadi rūpakāyapariniṣpattyāa na tathāgato draṣṭavya iti cet,
SA14kamvchtu:2383: bodhisattavaistathāgatasya vāksampadaṃ niṣpādayituṃ kathaṃ yatnaḥ karttavya iti vicintayadbhyo vāksampadamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2384: paramārthato vācya-vācaka-vacanānāmabhāvāt na tathāgatasyaivaṃ bhavati mayā dharmo deśita iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2388: vacanāni karaṇarūpāṇi śabdasvabhāvābhāvātmakāni vā tathā vistareṇa prāgevoktāni /
SA14kamvchtu:2396: kathaṃ tadabhūtamālapituṃ śakyata iti vicāraṇāyāmāha asatodgṛhītena iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2398: anena tathāgatasya vāksampadi pravṛttena bodhisattvena pratiśrutkādivajjñātvā pravartitavyamiti,
SA14kamvchtu:2401: pudgaladharmanairātmyadeśakena bhagavatā nānāpadavākyātmikeyaṃ dharmadeśanā kathaṃ prasidhyati?
SA14kamvchtu:2406: bhaveyuriti cintāyāṃ tatkasya hetoḥ? iti pṛṣṭam /

SA14kamvchtu:2414: sāmānyadravyatvābhyupagame svalakṣaṇa eva saṅgṛhītaṃ syāditi tanniṣedhena tasyāpi niṣedha eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2415: anyavyāvṛttyā sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyāropitasvabhāvamiti parikalpite sati dharmadeśanāyā nairarthakyatvena siddhasādhanam /
SA14kamvchtu:2417: paramārthataḥ svalakṣaṇasattve 'pi na yujyate tayā dharmadeśanā /
SA14kamvchtu:2418: sphoṭādiśabdasya nityasvabhāvasya paraiḥ padatvena parikalpitasya kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ tāvad virudhyate,
SA14kamvchtu:2421: anityasyāpi tāvat svalakṣaṇasva na yujyate padatvam,
SA14kamvchtu:2423: na hi yujyate anyasya saṅketo 'nyasya ca vyavahāraḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2425: ata eva svalakṣaṇamapyabhidhātuṃ na yujyate, ananvayāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2426: sāmānyapadārthe 'bhidheyatvenābhyupagate sati abhidheyasvabhāvatvena tasya svalakṣaṇasvarūpatvānna hi pradeśāntaragamanam /
SA14kamvchtu:2427: ekatvaṃ tu deśakālādibhinnāsvanekavyaktiṣvanugatamapi na yujyate tathā hi- (atha)
SA14kamvchtu:2428: ekasyāṃ vyaktau sarvātmanā vyāptaṃ syāt tadā yena ekatvena parikalpitaḥ sa svabhāvastena anyatrādhigatetaravyaktibhiḥ sambaddhaḥ taditarasvabhāvastatra na bhavediti,
SA14kamvchtu:2431: evaṃ yāvatyo bhinnavyaktayastāsāmekadeśena vyāptivyavasthayā tāvatīnāṃ grahaṇaṃ syāttadā ekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇena yuktaṃ bhavet,
SA14kamvchtu:2432: bhinnavyaktiṣu deśakālaparimāṇādibhinnāsu tāsvekavyaktigrahaṇaṃ tāvadekadeśagrahaṇād yugapudgrahaṇābhāva eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2436: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /

SA14kamvchtu:2456: ya evaṃ cintayanti teṣāmaviśrambhaṃ nivārayitum āryasubhūtiścittasampatsu smṛtyupasthānamadhikṛtya bhagavan ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:2461: paramārthataḥ skandhapudgalādīnāṃ satsvabhāvānupalambhāt na sattvāḥ ityanenādhyāropāntaniṣedhaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2463_0: bhaviṣyanti ityanayā deśanayā bhagavataḥ kīdṛgaviparītasmṛtyupasthānamiti sattvebhyo
SA14kamvchtu:2466: yadi na te sattvāḥ syustadā kathaṃ bhagavatā 'bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani śīlavanto guṇavantaśca te';

SA14kamvchtu:2482: tebhyo 'bhisambodhim adhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:2484: tadevaṃ manyate- paramārthābhiprāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmadeśanā pratiṣiddheti /

SA14kamvchtu:2510: sāmprataṃ pudgalanairātmyāvabodhasvabhāvaṃ pratipādayituṃ api tu khalu punaḥ sūbhūte ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:2518: anena sarveṇa kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /

SA14kamvchtu:2534: anantalokadhātūn ratnaiḥ paripūrya dānena yat puṇyaṃ tadapi upamāṃ naiva kṣamate /

SA14kamvchtu:2557: kiṃ sattvānāṃ sattve 'pi saṃkleśahetubhūtatayā tathā nābhipreyate tathāgatena?
SA14kamvchtu:2558: āhosvit sattvābhāvāditi cintayatāmāśayaṃ vijñāya tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2560: skandhātmakasya pudgalātmakasya ca kasyacit sattvasya paramārthato 'bhāvād evaṃ nopalabhyata iti darśayitumāha- nāstiṃ kaścit sattvo yastathāgatena parimocittaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2561: anena bodhisattvaiḥ kathamatra yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti tannirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2562: abhāvaḥ kathaṃ jñātavya ityatra yadi punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2565: tasmād yadi sattvaḥ syāt tadā sandṛśyeta sa tathāgatena,
SA14kamvchtu:2567: sa eva tāvattasya pragāḍhaḥ ātmagrāhaḥ syāt /

SA14kamvchtu:2607: tebhyo dharmakāyaparigrahamadhikṛtya tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ityādyāha /

SA14kamvchtu:2615: tataḥ sa nocyate tathāgata ityapi na yujyate,

SA14kamvchtu:2619: anena tathāvidhaṃ jñānahetukaṃ tathāgatakāyaṃ prati bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2622: bodhisattvena kathaṃ yogasamāpattyā pratipattavyamiti dvābhyāṃ gāthābhyāṃ pradarśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2623: tatra pūrvagāthayā kathaṃ tathāgato na draṣṭavyaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2629: rūpeṇa cādrākṣuḥ ityanena rūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ pudgalāḥ pāramārthikalakṣaṇādibhiralaṅkṛtaṃ dharmarūpaṃ pudgalarūpaṃ ca paśyantīti vyavahāraprajñaptirnidiṣṭā /

SA14kamvchtu:2664: yadyevaṃ samyagjñānasvabhāvānāṃ buddhanāmapi dharmiṇāṃ paramārthato 'siddhatvānna syād darśanam,
SA14kamvchtu:2667: ye paramārthataḥ sarvadharmiṇo na paśyanti ta eva dharmatāṃ paśyanti /

SA14kamvchtu:2696: ato bhagavatā buddhena tathyasaṃvṛtisvabhāvāyāḥ māhākaruṇāyā nirmāṇādau adhipatitvamādāya punarvineyebhyo yathāvadupāyopadarśanena (Vajraṭ_211)
SA14kamvchtu:2699: tathāvidhe bhagavatkāye chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti tadapi nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2702: tadā saṃsartā eva bhavatīti vikalpya saṃsāre 'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ darśayituṃ yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2710: yathoktam : “ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthgjanaḥ prajñaptimanupatitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2717: sahetuke 'pi nityahetuko vā anityahetuko veti vikaladvayam /
SA14kamvchtu:2720: nirapekṣasya sadasadavasthāsamatvena sarvatra nirviśiṣṭatvāt nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2722: nityasya itaraiḥ sahakāribhistāvanna kaścit sāmarthyaviśeṣaḥ kriyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2723: kutracidapyanapekṣaḥ san kimiva krameṇa kāryamutpādayenna yugapaditi /
SA14kamvchtu:2731: taditarānyahetau cānabhīṣṭe kathaṃ na nirhetukaḥ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2738: na tāvad yujyate tṛtīyapakṣo 'pi samānāsamānakālayoḥ kāraṇatvavirodhāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2739: tathā hi, hetau sati sa phalena (kāryeṇa)
SA14kamvchtu:2752: tatra taditarakālavyavadhānena phalotpāde sati vināśādevotpādaḥ abhyupagamyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:2754: anyathā akārakasya vinaṣṭavastuno vināśāt kathaṃ (utpādaḥ) bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:2755: avyavadhāneneti pakṣe 'pi yadi sarvātmanā avyabahitastadā tadeva samakālatvaṃ syāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2756: niravayavayordvayorvastunoḥ sarvātmanā avyavahitatve ekakālatvātiriktā nānyā gatiḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2757: tasmāt sarvātmanā avyavahite sati pūrvaṃ yathā aṇumātrakam (iti prasaktam)
SA14kamvchtu:2760: ataḥ paramārthataḥ sarve bhāvā anutpannā eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2764: 'kāryakāraṇayorāgopālaṃ prasiddhatvānna yujyate vimarśaḥ iti vādaḥ kathaṃ yujyeta,
SA14kamvchtu:2767: na cakṣu pramāṇaṃ na śrotragrāṇaṃ na jihvā pramāṇaṃ na kāyacittam /
SA14kamvchtu:2768: pramāṇaṃ yadyeta bhaveyurindriyāḥ kasyāryamārgeṇa bhavet kāryam //
SA14kamvchtu:2770: yasmādime indriya apramāṇā jadā svabhāvena avyākṛtaśca /
SA14kamvchtu:2771: tasmād ya nirvāṇapathaiva ārthikaḥ sa āryamārgeṇa karotu kāryam //
SA14kamvchtu:2776: ato bhagavatā śālistambādiṣu bhāvānāṃ svaparodayo niṣiddhaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2785: sva eva yadā nāsti paro hetuḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA14kamvchtu:2793: anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāptatvāt mahājñānālokodayā labdhānuttarapuṇyaskandhā bodhisattvāḥ kathaṃ saṃsāraduḥkham anubhaveyurityevamāveditam /
SA14kamvchtu:2799: tatrānutpanneṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiprāptyā bodhisattveṣu nāstyubhayavidho duḥkhahetuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2805: kathaṃ vā bahutarapuṇyaskandhotpādamātreṇa saṃsāre 'pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ sandarśitamityāśaṅkya punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2806: anena tāvad utpannapuṇyaskandhe 'pi teṣāṃ mithyābhiniveśena puṇyaskandhaparigrahasya sarvasaṃkleśamūlaviparyāsasyāprahīṇatvam, ataḥ (te)
SA14kamvchtu:2808: bodhisattvānāṃ tu anutpattikadharmakṣāntiprāpteḥ puṇyaskandheṣu nāsti satyābhiniveśaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2811: tadayamāśayaḥ- tattatsūtreṣu bhagavatā 'bodhisattvaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ parigṛhṇāti'; ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:2812: atra na parigrahītavyaḥ iti vacanena kathaṃ na virodha iti?
SA14kamvchtu:2813: bhagavānapi yenābhiprāyeṇoktavān tadubhayamapi darśayitumāha- parigrahītavyaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2814: parigrahīta iti yadāha tattu parigrahalakṣaṇanaya upasaṃhāralakṣaṇaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2819: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prārabhya audāryamuktam,
SA14kamvchtu:2821: etena sakalena sthānena śāśvatocchedāntaṃ parihṛtya madhyamamārgo deśitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2831_0: tadā bhagavataścaturīryāpathena janmābhiniṣkramaṇādinā cāgamaprasiddhena kathaṃ na
SA14kamvchtu:2831_1: virodha iti yo manyate tadarthaṃ prasthānasampada īryāpathena prasthitimadhikṛtya
SA14kamvchtu:2831_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yaḥ kaścid ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2832: gacchati vā āgacchati vā ityetaddvayena caṅkramaṇam,
SA14kamvchtu:2835: bhagavata āgamena paridīpitānāmīryāpathādīnāṃ yaḥ samyaktayā śabdaśo 'bhiniveśastāsya viparītābhiniveśānna jānāti tathāgatena bhāṣitasyārtham /
SA14kamvchtu:2844: tasmād evaṃvidhāyāṃ īryāpathaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti sandarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2846: kathaṃ tathāgataḥ iti gatyā prabhāvita ivocyata iti cittāśayaṃ vitarkyāha- tatkasya hetoḥ? iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2847: na me sa bhāṣitasyārthamājānāti ityanena yojanīyam /
SA14kamvchtu:2850: api tu adhigamena prabhāvitaḥ gataḥ ityasyādhigatyarthatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2857: tacca gamanādi kvacit saṃvṛtāvapi na sambhavati,
SA14kamvchtu:2861: tataḥ sa vastusvabhāvādhigatyā samastalokasya jyeṣṭhatvāt pūjanīyatvāt arhan ityucyate,
SA14kamvchtu:2863: anyathātvena jaḍasvabhāvena rūpakāyastu tathā nocyata iti bhāvaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2866: saṃvṛtau tathāgatasya nirmāṇakāyamāśritya anantalokadhātuṣu apratihatagamanādipradarśanena ādāryamapi pradarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2871: tasyāpi ekānekasvabhāvavisaṃyogānmāyānirmitabuddhavat mṛṣātvaṃ darśayituṃ bhājanasattvalokabhāvavigamāt prasthitimadhikṛtya yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2875: tadyathāpi nāma maṣiṃ kuryāt....... paramāṇusañcayaḥ ityanena ekānekasvabhāvaviyogāvagamena tanukaraṇopāyo darśitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2881: saced bhagavan iti vijñaya ekatvagrāhakanivṛttyupāyārthameva paramāṇuprabhedena (yaḥ)
SA14kamvchtu:2882: sañcayaḥ sa ukto na tu paramārthato 'navasthitatvāt,
SA14kamvchtu:2884: tasmāt na bhagavānavakṣyat paramāṇusañcaya iti abhāṣite 'pyevamākhyātatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:2885: anena tathāgatasya rūpābhāvatvena tādṛśyāṃ sthitau chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti deśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2887: api nu bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet?
SA14kamvchtu:2888: iti kasmād bhagavānavakṣyadityāśayaṃ viditvā tatkasya hetoḥ? ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2889: asañcayaḥ saḥ iti pūrvottarādidigbhāgabhedena avasthitānāṃ teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ svabhāvenāsiddhatvānna yujyate tattvataḥ sañcayaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2892: asati ca digbhāgabhede paramāṇavaḥ paramāṇvantaraiḥ pūrvāparordhvādhodigbhāgabhedena parivṛtā na syuḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2894: bhāga eva bhavati paramāṇurityapi kathanaṃ na yujyate,
SA14kamvchtu:2897: aniṣṭhitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svabhāvena tarhi tvayā kiṃ sādhyate?
SA14kamvchtu:2903: ye paramāṇavastvayā niravayavatvena vyavasthāpyante teṣāṃ pūrvottarādidigbhedābhyupetatvāt digbhāgabhedenābhyupagamyante,
SA14kamvchtu:2911: na rūpe naiva netre ca tayormadhye 'pi na sthitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2912: yatra sthito bhavettatra na sannaiva hi cāpyasat //
SA14kamvchtu:2915: bahuḥ sa paramāṇusañcayo bhavet ityanenaudāryaṃ cābhihitam,
SA14kamvchtu:2918: samprati sattvalokābhāvaprasthitimadhikṛtya bhāṣitastrisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturiti saḥ ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2921: ata eva adhātuḥ sa tathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ iti pañcaskandhātmakaḥ sa sattvaloko 'pyekānekasvabhāvavirahitaḥ pūrvavaduktaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2922: anena tathāgatasya tathāvidhāyāṃ sattvalokābhāvaprasthitau bodhisattvena chandapraṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti nirdiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2923: nirābhāsena tu yogasamāpattiriyaṃ kathaṃ pratipattavyetyapi sandarśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2924: idānīṃ cittaṃ kathaṃ pragrahītavyamiti darśayituṃ tatkasya hetoḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2929: yadi sattvaloko yathāprasiddhastathā paramārthataḥ syāt sthūlaikasvabhāvastadā tathāgatena yathāsthiti vastutattvamadhigatamiti sa eva (Vajraṭ_221)
SA14kamvchtu:2932: sa eva ca tathāgatasya piṇḍagrāho 'tigāḍhataraḥ syāt,
SA14kamvchtu:2934: na tvevam, ata evānyatra yo bālajanebhyaḥ piṇḍagrāha ātmagrāhasya hetutvena bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ sa paramārthato 'grāhya eva /
SA14kamvchtu:2940: vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti paramārthe 'bhāvāt sa dharmastvanabhilāpya ityuktavān /
SA14kamvchtu:2941: yadyevaṃ grāhyaḥ piṇḍo na syāt tadā tatra grāhakasyāpyabhāvāt kathaṃ vyavahāre piṇḍagrāha iti vicintyāha- sa ca bālapṛthajanairudgṛhītaḥ iti /
SA14kamvchtu:2946: anyathā yathāvastu vyavahāraprajñaptau kathaṃ te bālāḥ syuḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2949: anena yadā sarve bhāvāḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvaśūnyāstadā rūpakāyaḥ jñānakāyaśca kathaṃ bhavet paramārthataḥ sasvabhāvaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:2951: samprati yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādinā sarvasthāneṣu yogasamāpatteḥ kenopāyena sarvatra samādheyamiti tat pradarśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2952: evamanusandhiḥ- yadi nāsti piṇḍagrāhastadā tanmūlaprabhavāyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭerevābhāvāt kathaṃ bhagavān pañcasu dṛṣṭiṣu satkāyadṛṣṭimāheti tadarthaṃ yo hi kaścit subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:2960: tatra yo hi kaścit subhūte ityārabhya tenocyate ātmadṛṣṭiḥ etatparyantamanena kathamavikalpyaṃ taduddiṣṭam /
SA14kamvchtu:2963: bhagavatā tu pudgalanairātmyapratipādanādātmaniṣedhārthamāha ātmadṛṣṭiḥ iti tasyāḥ ātmadṛṣṭernirākaraṇena dharmanairātmyaṃ vyavasthāpyate adṛṣṭiḥ sā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityuktam /
SA14kamvchtu:2967: evaṃ hi subhūtea bodhisattvayānasamprasthitena ityanena yo 'vikalpakaḥ sa paridīpyate /
SA14kamvchtu:2969: jñātavyā draṣṭavyā adhimoktavyāḥ ityanena yenāvikalpyaṃ tadabhihitam /
SA14kamvchtu:2980: yathā na pratyupasthāmahe ityanena yo 'vikalpastaṃ darśayati /
SA14kamvchtu:2981: asaṃjñaiṣā tathāgatena bhāṣitā ityatra hetuḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:2992: tatra yadi nāsti dharmasaṃjñā tadā tathāgatasya sattvebhyo taddharmadeśanāsaṃjñāsamutpāde kathaṃ na bhavet saṃkleśaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2993: kṛpayā sattvārthaṃ yāvatsaṃsārāvasthāne sati dharmasaṃjñayā kathaṃ na syāt saṃkleśaḥ?
SA14kamvchtu:2994: iti vicintya tayaiva cittasampadā deśanāsaṃkleśaṃ gāthayā ca saṃsārākleśamāvedayitum yaśca khalu punaḥ subhūte ityādyāha /
SA14kamvchtu:3002: anena yamānmahārtho 'yaṃ dharmastasmādbodhisattvenaivaṃvidhāyāṃ mahārthadharmadeśanāyāmavaśyameva chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyaṃ tatparidīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:3003: bhāṣyamāṇāyāmapi kathaṃ na syātsaṃkleśa ityetaddarśayituṃ kathaṃ na samprakāśayet ityāha /
SA14kamvchtu:3006: evamuktam- yathā vineyajanāstathā sarve dharmā ādito 'nutpannatvādanabhilāpyāḥ (Vajraṭ_224)
SA14kamvchtu:3007: tasmānna te kenāpi vyapadeśyā ityevaṃ darśyata iti /
SA14kamvchtu:3011: ata eva tathāgato dharmadeśanākāle viśuddhalokajñāne prasthitaḥ,
SA14kamvchtu:3017: sāmprataṃ nikhilaprajñāpāramitākāyaṃ vyavasthāpya gāthayā saṃsārāsaṃkleśo deśyate /
SA14kamvchtu:3023: tatra pañcaskandhātmakānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yathāpratīti pratītyasamutpādastāvad hetupratyayasaṃgṛhitatvāt saṃskṛtaṃ ityucyate /
SA14kamvchtu:3024: eteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ tārakāḥ iva draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:3027: tathaiva saṃskṛtā api avidyājñānāndhakāre sati pratibhāsante,
SA14kamvchtu:3031: vijñānalakṣaṇaṃ ca karmavartikaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehaṃ cāśritya prajvalanād dāpa iva draṣṭavyam,
SA14kamvchtu:3041: yā kācid vedanā seha duḥkhamiti bhāṣitatvāt /
SA14kamvchtu:3042: trividhaiḥ dukhaiḥ sarvā vedanā duḥkhā veditavyā /
SA14kamvchtu:3060: tatra ye tāvadatītāste smṛtimātrāvasthitā ato niḥsvabhāvatvena,
SA14kamvchtu:3063: pratyupannā vidyudaupamyena ekānekasvabhāvarahitāḥ agrāhyasvabhāvatvaditi tenānvitā vyapadiṣṭāḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:3065: abhraupamyena ākāśasamacitte tadbījadauṣṭhulyena janitatvāditi nairātmyadvayaṃ tāvaddeśitam /
SA14kamvchtu:3066: ato 'nena khalu samagreṇātra bodhisattvaiḥ sadā sarvasaṃskṛtasvabhāvamevaṃ vicārya chanda-praṇidhānābhyāṃ sthātavyamiti paridīpitam /
SA14kamvchtu:3069: gāthāyāmasyāṃ tāvadidaṃ paridīpyate- saṃkleśamulaṃ tāvad viparyāsaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:3070: ataḥ saṃskṛtasvabhāveṣvanekaśaḥ kenacid vicārayatā manasikurvatā apyevaṃ saṃskāraparijñānādyadā viparyāsābhāvāt na bhavati saṃkleśaṃ (tadā)
SA14kamvchtu:3080: kartuṃ loke sukhaṃ śāntau bhave cāpyanadhiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA14kamvchtu:3082: traiyadhvikānāṃ jananī munīnāṃ khyātā yathāśakti mayā tato jagat /
SA14kamvchtu:3083: vipulena puṇyena viyatsamena vidhūya cāndhyaṃ sugatatvamāpnuyāt //
SA14kamvchtu:3084: ācāryakamalaśīlena mādhyamikanayena viracitā vistṛtā āryavajracchedikāṭīkā parisamāptā /
SA14kamvchtu:3085: aṣṭamyāṃ śatābdyāṃ bhāratīyācārya mañjuśrīmitreṇa bhota-locāvā yeśe-demahābhāgena ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāmanūditā /
SA14kamvchtu:3086: viduṣāṃ vaśaṃvadena ācāryapemātenajinamahādayena bhoṭabhāṣātaḥ saṃskṛtabhāṣāyāṃ punaruddhṛtā sarvasattvahitasukhārtham iti /
